title: Firefox updates have become downdates.
content: I have stopped using your updates to Firefox as you have taken away features. No longer is there a History icon and thank goodness the Ctrl+H still works. Am afraid to update as more features may be taken away.
creator: dennis.sellers

title: no volume after restarting my macbook air
content: After restarting my macbook air, I cannot get any volume or microphone to work through Firefox. I was able to get volume by changing my browser to safari. I'm hoping to find a solution because I have all my bookmarks set up with firefox. I'm guessing it has to be with the privacy settings, but so far I haven't found a solution. Can anyone help?
creator: moxie_1977

title: Firefox crashes constantly
content:
Hi, my Firefox browser will crash about once a day, every several hours, causing me to have to restart my computer. I have followed the tips above to check RAM for errors with none found, tried running Firefox in Troubleshoot mode (it still crashed) and have updated several times to the newest version over the last year, still with crashing. I'm following this message with error codes. Thanks for your help.
